attributes.action: Start feeding the poor and stop buying kitchens for over paid mp's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why not use video conferencing instead of second homes traveling and expensive goods . All that just to argue like children in a playground. Do they care about the environment. No they don't.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
